failures.details: Tests expect actual workspace/plan files to exist but mocks aren't creating them. Methods like getBuildScripts, addBuildScript, deleteBuildScript fail with 'Workspace/Plan not found' errors.
vi.mocked(exec).mockImplementation is not a function - runBuildScript tests can't mock child_process exec properly
Tests use getByRole('button', {name: /edit/i}) but there are 2 Edit buttons (Goals and Success Criteria). Should use getAllByRole or more specific selectors.
Form starts collapsed. Tests try to access form fields (name, description, command) without first clicking 'Add New Build Script' button to expand the form.

data.assessment: MINOR FAILURES - Test implementation issues, not functionality bugs
